articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: Defense Of Sweden! US Holds Rare ‘Bomber Drills’ Near Russia With B-52, B-1 Warplanes & JAS-39 Gripens - EurAsian Times
articles.description: On March 6, the US Air Force conducted a rare dual bomber flyover over Stockholm, featuring a B-52 Stratofortress and a B-1 Lancer flanked by Swedish Air Force Gripens.  The US Air Forces in Europe (USAFE) highlighted the flyover’s route, which included promi…
articles.content:
On March 6, the US Air Force conducted a rare dual bomber flyover over Stockholm, featuring a B-52 Stratofortress and a B-1 Lancer flanked by Swedish Air Force Gripens.
